ModMetaData.name: Aerocraft Framework
ModMetaData.author: 空曜
ModMetaData.description:
本Mod提供一种主要在地图内进行飞行作战的飞行器及其框架（绝大部分功可以通过Xml的Comp实现） This Mod provides an aerocraft and its framework that primarily performs flight operations within a map (the majority of its functions can be achieved through Comp in Xml)
1.特性： 1.通过鼠标右键移动、强制攻击、跟随（操纵方式类似于殖民者） 2.无视地形的飞行 3.在飞行中免疫近战攻击，受到爆炸伤害降低为20%，在飞行中才能正常开火（可以在Mod设置中开启或关闭）
1.Characteristic: 1. Move, forcefully attack, and follow with the right mouse button (similar to how colonizers operate) 2. Flying without regard for terrain 3. Immune to melee attacks during flight, reduce explosion damage to 20%, and fire normally during flight (can be turned on or off in Mod settings)
2.Mod内容包括： 1.一次性自爆型无人机及其部署背包 2.对标小型自动机枪塔的小型无人机 3.具有多个武器、可载人的中型飞行器 4.具备装载并投掷炮弹功能、可载人的中型飞行器 5.提供护盾、照明、发射灭火弹的辅助型中型飞行器 6.部署无人机、具有多个武器、可载人的大型飞行器
2.Mod content includes: 1. Disposable self-explosive drone and its deployment backpack 2. Small drone benchmarking mini-turret 3. Medium sized Aerocraft with multiple weapons and capable of carrying pawns 4. Medium sized Aerocraft capable of loading and throwing shells, capable of carrying pawns 5. Auxiliary medium sized Aerocraft that provide shields, lighting, and fire extinguishing shells 6. Deploy drones, large aerocraft with multiple weapons, and capable of carrying pawns
3.CE：兼容（但是我不玩CE，所以平衡存疑） 3.CE: Compatible (but I don't play CE, so balance is questionable...maybe)
4.Bug： 1.（没什么影响）飞行器爆炸时会有关于Tick的错误信息（除了有红字之外没有任何影响，比起每时每刻都在检测是否被Destroy的多余性能消耗，一条错误信息无所谓） 2.（没什么影响）通过建筑安装武器并完成建造时会有错误信息（没有影响，大概是因为还没完全生成就被Destroy的原因） 3.跨地图时，如果像空投舱一样装载殖民者的话，通过“取消装载”按钮释放殖民者，再次装载殖民者将无法识别殖民者。 【解决办法：通过“内容”标签页点击“×”来释放殖民者或者通过右键进入飞行器】 4.当超出地图外时，被自动摧毁 【解决办法：尽量不要在地图边缘战斗，在Mod设置中开启的“检测地图边界”也将在飞行器到达地图边界时强制飞行器折返】
4.Bug： 1. (Not a big impact) When the aerocraft explodes, there will be error messages about Tick (except for the error message, which has no impact. Compared to constantly detecting whether it has been consumed by Destroy's excess performance, an error message does not matter) 2. (Not a big impact) There will be error messages when installing weapons by the building and completing the construction (no impact, probably because they were destroyed before they were fully generated) 3. When crossing maps, if colonizers are loaded like "drop pods" , releasing them through the "Cancel load" Gizmos will make it difficult for colonizers to recognize them if they are loaded again. 【Solution: Click on the "Contents" tab “×” To release the colonizers or right-click to enter the aerocraft】 4. Automatically destroyed when exceeding the map 【 Solution: Try not to fight at the edge of the map as much as possible, and the "Detect map edge for forced turnbacks" enabled in Mod settings will also force the aerocraft to turn back when it reaches the map edge】
